name: Ghouls 'n Bumps
description:
Roll on as a ghost-possessed Jack-'o-Lantern and hop over and through the multi-eyed goops blocking your path! Try to get the highest score!

Controls:
Jump = Space

Dash/Shield = Left mouse click

Credits: 

Code - Lahja Pulkkinen

Design - Lahja Pulkkinen

Graphics - Jenna Laurinen, Jonne Halme, Tiiti Liias
